title: Otto the Otter
synopsis: A simple comic where small events turn to trouble, with Otto failing comedically every time.
visual_style: Visually colorful yet softly faded, using a limited mid-20th-century color palette. Flat colors, minimal shading, clean and confident line work, and very little detail. Backgrounds are suggestive rather than descriptive, creating a calm, artistic, and pleasant atmosphere. Traditional hand-drawn look with a single full-bleed image, no frames, no borders, and no panel structure.

locations.name: Town Square
locations.description: A plain town square with boxy buildings, large windows, and minimal details.

characters.name: Otto
characters.description: A charming otter with a simple design and clear expressions, wearing a blue t-shirt and jeans. Well-intentioned and earnest. Well-intentioned, earnest, and subtly socially unaware.

rules: You can not access the moon or outer space.
long_term_goals: Consistently try to be kind, helpful, and responsible in everyday situations.
Solve small problems for others, even when it backfires.
Maintain optimism and decency despite repeated, humorous failures.
